Class Description
AbstractController
Abstract class for controller classes in the MVC desing pattern.
AbstractModel
Abstract model class in the MVC design pattern.
AbstractView
Abstract class of views in the MVC design pattern.
AdministratorModel
A User type model, administrators have all around rights in the application for modifications
AdministratorModelTest  
Application
Main class for starting up application.
AuthorizationException
Exception class for letting the controller know if authorization failed
CourseBuildView
"build" view for course resource
CourseController
The controller class for controlling the Courses, it accepts interactions from the end user.
CourseEditView
"edit" view for course resource inherits the build view, but loads in the data
CourseIndexInstructorView
View for courses instructed by Instructor
CourseIndexStudentView
View for all the student's taken courses
CourseModel
Course entity representation.
CourseModelTest

View for showing the courses of one subject.

View for showing the courses of one subject.
CourseShowView
"show" view for course resource Actually shows the students that took this course
CoursesTableModel
Table model used widely by views in which courses get to be on display.
CoursesTableModel.CourseColumn  
CourseType
String enumerator for the Course types.
CourseTypeComboBoxModel
Checkbox model used widely by views in which courses get to be edited or created.
DashboardView
Welcome view for the user.
Database
Representative singleton class of a database in real life.
DatabaseDamagedException
Database management exception for letting the outer world know if the database files couldn't be properly loaded.
DatabaseNotFound
Database management exception for letting the outer world know if the database files are non-existent.
DatabasePersistenceException
Database management exception for letting the outer world know if the saving of the database ran into IO problems.
EntityNotFoundException
Exception used for letting the controller know if the queried entity is existent in database
InstructorComboBoxModel
Checkbox model used widely by views in which instructors get to be edited or created.
InstructorModel
Representation of an instructor in the application system.
InstructorModelTest  
LoginView
"login" view for user resource
ManagerFunction<T>
A "function storage" used in the database for json interpretation
PaddedFrame
A JFrame extension which fills the border layout with blank panels to function as padding around the display.
PlutoConsole
Singleton System.out wrapper class, used for custom console logging.
RegistrationView
"build" view for user resource Registration view is connected to login page
StringValidator
String validation helper class.
StudentModel
Representation of a student in the system.

SubjectIndexStudentView

SubjectIndexView
